channel.title: Community on Open Cluster Management
channel.description: Recent content in Community on Open Cluster Management

item.title: Releases
item.description: Open Cluster Management has approximately a three to four month release cycle. The current release is v0.9.0. Continue reading to view upcoming releases: 0.10.0, 17th, Feb 2023 The Open Cluster Management team is proud to announce the release of OCM v0.10.0! We mainly focused on bug fixes, code refactoring, and code stability in this release. Also we worked on several important design proposals on addon lifecycle enhancement and manifestwork orchestration which will be implemented in the next release.

item.title: Roadmap
item.description: The Open Cluster Management community uses GitHub Project to track the progress of the project.
